label: Person-year survey dataset
description: includes survey data in person-year format
column5: each person-year is contained in one data row

label: Zygosity dataset
description: includes data of the zygosity questionnaire on which the zygosity assessment for the twin pairs is based

label: Mode dataset
description: includes information on the survey mode (e.g., CAPI, CASI, PAPI) for each variable in person-year format
